import React from "react"; function About() { return (

User-friendly Features To
Make Your Life Easier

Learn about the customized services we’re
providing and the easy steps to get them

Individual Users

Enjoy 10 free images every month and
get all basic editing you could possibly
need for your personal photos.

SME

Whether it’s heavy seasonal or daily small
bulks of photos; get them edited at the
lowest time and cost.

Large Enterprises

Contact us to get customized deals
tailored especially to suit your image
editing needs.

Individual Partner


We bring image editing processes at the tip of your
finger. Easily edit your personal photographs, selfies and
nature or portrait photos just by uploading them in the
app. Simply upload your desired photograph to remove
its background or to change it to something different
from our wide variety of template collections.

Immediate Benefits-

Maybe there’s a picture of yourself that you like but the
background isn’t to your liking. Looking for options other
than unhappily discarding it? This is where we step in!
Send us the image and we’ll remove the background or
change it to something suited to your taste.

While we’re at it, you can instruct the app to change the
size of the photos or just color it something different. We
have some amazing free offers for you as well that will
blow your mind.

Get 10 free images to test out our app and then decide
whether you’d like to continue your journey with us.


As we understand the personal image editing facilities
you may require every month, we’re offering you 10 free
images per month to use them for your personalized
editing needs.

How It Works


Take three simple steps and become our partner!


Upload a photo

Go to your desired command, upload
the photo you want to get edited and
confirm it to the app.

See the result

After waiting for a few seconds, your
desired output will be right in front of
you. Check if it’s to your liking and
customize it with pre-set templates if
necessary.

Download it!

Like the final result? If yes, simply
click on the download option and
use it according to your need.

Bringing an automated app that provide high
quality images at the lowest time & cost.

Say hello to the new era of editing where we help you transition from the traditional hours-long,
costly image editing to a blink of an eye automated image editing solution.

How to Use 

 Tools & API 
 Pricing 
 Contact 
 Download

The KOW Company, Dhaka Bangladesh

©Retouched.Ai


); } export default About;
